column2: Unlike in recent times, when Barca's season reached the crucial moment, his scoring touch - and luck - deserted him.
He failed to find the net in either leg of the semi-final against Chelsea

Lionel Messi is a footballer / soccer player from Argentina, playing for FC Barcelona

Messi Won 5 Spanish La Liga Titles with FC Barcelona
Messi Won 3 Champions league Titles with FC Barcelona
